thread.title: Virginia quietly grants death row inmates new privileges

title: Virginia quietly grants death row inmates new privileges
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer - Today 
Only a few months ago, the condemned men on Virginia's death row left their tiny cells just three days a week for showers, and an hour a day...
